title: The Experience: Memoirs of a Man
description: The Experience: Memoirs of a Man is a literary open nerve portraying the importance of evaluating life's experiences for the purpose of personal growth. Through emphasis on the processes necessary to become a better person, and disclosure on an individual journey to becoming a man, this collection of memoirs looks at the life of a multi-racial man living in twenty-first century America through the experiential lenses of religion, ministry, education, writing, fatherhood, and relationships with women.
author: Lewis P. Bryon
